protocol.name: P-G3350-1
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-2
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA and an additional 2h 10¼M NAA treatment. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-3
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA and an additional 6h 10¼M NAA treatment. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-4
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA and an additional 6h mock-treatment. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-5
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old slr-1 seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-6
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old slr-1 seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA and an additional 2h 10¼M NAA treatment. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-7
protocol.text: Root segments as described in Himanen et al (2002; Plant Cell, 14, 2339-2351)  were dissected from 3 day old slr-1 seedlings, germinated on 10 ¼M NPA and an additional 6h 10¼M NAA treatment. Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3350-8
protocol.text: Approximately 5.8 ¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.
